__e: Oh, yes, Sergeant Schultz eats only three meals a day like all the rest of the men.
That's more like the Sergeant Schultz we all know, and love.
You see, Sergeant Schultz and I were just having a bit of a joke, as you might call it.
Something must be done about this Gunney Highway.
I'll tell you who's sick Gunney Highway is the sickest individual I've ever come across.
"Don't fuck with Gunney Highway, or you'll end up in the brig"
